content: FYI to anyone following along, our plan is to put out a new build with support for the Montreal DSTU3 snapshot by the end of the week, with a final 1.5 release due out within probably a week after that.
Thanks, James. I was thinking about that - sounds great.

Montreal DSTU3 snapshot build (1.5-SNAPSHOT) has now been pushed to Maven. I expect we'll push a finalized 1.5 build within the next 7 days (just some documentation tasks outstanding, as well as finishing a new server security module we're adding).

For anyone who wanted to try out the CLI tool against Montreal DSTU3, a copy of the CLI can be downloaded here: https://fileportal.uhn.ca/download.aspx?ID=c33ffbbe-6599-49a7-b37a-a16fe1fe7b78

197 Megs of goodness!
Dare I ask about terminology expansion?

Hehe yeah, I really need to put some effort into streamlining the size at some point. There are a lot of duplicate code JARs in there.

Terminology will be done... soon....... I know I keep promising that :) It's probably 80% done at this point
The trouble is that if you supply something great - people just want more!
